chapter.title: Extension packaging
chapter.para: DataCleaner extensions are packages of added functionality, written in Java. To correctly package an extension, these are the requirements:

listitem.para: The extension must consist of a single JAR file. If you have dependencies other than the libraries provided by the DataCleaner distribution, you need to package these inside your own JAR file.
